content: MH-RSC Strut clamp Hop-dip galvanized rigid strut clamp ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Pipe supports- - - ### FEATURES:Features Range of sizes available for standard pipe diameters Hot-dip galvanized for improved corrosion resistance Applications Sized to fit rigid pipes To be installed on both Hilti Strut and MIQ ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Clamp: Carbon steel – ASTM A1011 CS Type B, Clamping screw: 304 Stainless Steel Surface finish: Outdoor Coated - HDG Environmental conditions: Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) Technical Data | Material composition | Clamp: Carbon steel – ASTM A1011 CS Type B, Clamping screw: 304 Stainless Steel | Surface finish | Outdoor Coated - HDG | Environmental conditions | Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) | Width - B | 1-1/4 in ### ITEMS- 2211594 - Strut clamp MH-RSC 1/2 HDG rigid - Package Size 100 pc - 2211595 - Strut clamp MH-RSC 3/4 HDG rigid - Package Size 100 pc - 2211596 - Strut clamp MH-RSC 1 HDG rigid - Package Size 100 pc - 2211597 - Strut clamp MH-RSC 1-1/4 HDG rigid - Package Size 50 pc - 2211598 - Strut clamp MH-RSC 1-1/2 HDG rigid - Package Size 50 pc - 2211599 - Strut clamp MH-RSC 2 HDG rigid - Package Size 50 pc - 2212420 - Strut clamp MH-RSC 2-1/2 HDG rigid - Package Size 50 pc - 2212421 - Strut clamp MH-RSC 3 HDG rigid - Package Size 25 pc - 2212423 - Strut clamp MH-RSC 4 HDG rigid - Package Size 25 pc
